String2: You will be notified by email when a game on your wishlist reaches a new historical low price.
String4: You will be notified by email when a new bundle appears.
String6: You will be notified by email when a new paid game is temporarily available for free.
String8: You will be notified by email when new games appear on subscription services that can be redeemed on platforms such as Steam or GOG.
String10: You will be notified by email when relevant news appears on the website and these are not from the previous categories.
String11: Note: To avoid spam emails, emails are only sent when the new historical price has a difference of at least 10 euro cents compared to the previous price.
String13: You will be notified by email when there is any new news related to the website such as updates or changes.
String15: You will be notified by email when games are being removed from sale in official stores.
String18: You will be notified by email when a game on your wishlist appears in a bundle.
